name: Exploding Tiles (SephDB)
description:
Place a piece on the board each turn and take over the whole board with a large explosion chain!

Each tile can only hold as many pieces as it has neighbors before it explodes and pushes one piece into each of its neighbors.

Choose the board size, the amount of players and their shapes/colors, and what kind of player they are(mouse controlled or one of three difficulty levels of AI)

This game was made with the challenge of not using any external assets. Everything in the game is generated by the code. This does mean there is no text or sound effects.

Have fun playing with friends or trying to beat the AI!
